text: If anyone has some good (non-city) bike paths to share, I only know Marine Dr & springwater corridor. Looking to do ~30mi or so.
<@U0XJFPSRL> mentioned something about a cool bike path out in Vernonia
yes! banks to Vernonia trail is so fun !
Used to be old railroad tracks through the woods that they paved over and made into a bike path
This looks so amazing, exactly what I was looking for!
How long should I allow, like 4-5hrs?
Considering stopping, condition of path, etc
I haven’t done the full thing before. There’s a lot of stop-offs/parking place along the way so I usually park, bike, and then turn around at some point and go back.
Cool. I’m excited, wish it wasn’t supposed to rain this weekend.
yes, the full thing takes about 4 hours and you can stop to have lunch in Vernonia
the 10 mile mark is at Stub Stewart State park which is also fun to hang out at
and if you’re into mountain biking they have some cool trails for that as well
